data.label: jLottie
data.description: jLottie 是一个用 JavaScript 编写的 Lottie 播放器，其目标是尽可能减小文件大小。jLottie 适合作为通用 Lottie 播放器，但只实现了核心播放器功能的一个子集——这种方法不仅占用空间小，而且性能卓越。

data.label: jLottie
data.description: jLottie is a Lottie player written in javascript with an aim to have the smallest possible file size. jLottie is suitable as a general purpose lottie player, though implements a subset of the features in the core player - this approach leads to a tiny footprint and great performance.
